During a teleconference Monday, Simon Cowell suggested his former American Idol colleague Paula Abdul could be in the running for The X-Factor judging panel. "I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul ," he said. We've been in regular contact. I'm not going to say today who we are going to confirm or not, because the truth is we haven't made up our minds up yet.... It comes down to who I think is interesting, and the commitment and the expertise each person offers. The panel for the show( which debuts next fall) won't be announced for several weeks. Crown Prosecution Service said it would re-examine material collected by police officers who investigated allegations that journalists at the newspaper illegally accessed the voicemail of several public figures. Keir Starmer , the Director of Public Prosecutions, announced a comprehensive assessment of all material in the possession of the Metropolitan Police Service relating to phone hacking. The allegations concern the behaviour of journalists during the time that Mr Andy Coulson was editor of the newspaper.
